document_name_accent: ung thu vom hong giai doan 1.json
document_title: Stage 1 nasopharyngeal cancer: Symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: ung-thu-vom-hong-giai-doan-1.json_3_Prognosis of survival rate for stage 1 nasopharyngeal cancer
subsection_content: MSc. Dr. Luu Thao Ngoc said that from clinical practice, a high percentage of stage 1 nasopharyngeal cancer cases have been cured after radical radiotherapy alone (over 90%), especially using Using advanced radiotherapy techniques such as dose-modulated radiotherapy (IMRT) has brought about good disease control, reduced acute and chronic treatment-related complications, and improved the quality of life for patients.
subsection_title: ung thu vom hong giai doan 1.json. Prognosis of survival rate for stage 1 nasopharyngeal cancer
subsection_data:
ung thu vom hong giai doan 1.json. Prognosis of survival rate for stage 1 nasopharyngeal cancer
MSc. Dr. Luu Thao Ngoc said that from clinical practice, a high percentage of stage 1 nasopharyngeal cancer cases have been cured after radical radiotherapy alone (over 90%), especially using Using advanced radiotherapy techniques such as dose-modulated radiotherapy (IMRT) has brought about good disease control, reduced acute and chronic treatment-related complications, and improved the quality of life for patients.
